#summary Patches for MySQL 5
#labels Featured

= Introduction =

These have the same functionality as the MySQL 4 patches. There are two patch sets, one with [http://google-mysql-tools.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/mysql-patches/mysql-5.0.37-patches all functionality] and one limited to [http://google-mysql-tools.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/mysql-patches/mysql-5.0.37_semisync.patch semi-sync] replication.
